md:
giải nghĩa từ "plan" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Plan** (noun)

* Meaning: a detailed proposal for doing or achieving something
* Example: "The company has a plan to increase sales by 20% next year."
* Related words: strategy, scheme, blueprint, outline

**Plan** (verb)

* Meaning: to decide on a course of action, to make a detailed proposal
* Example: "We need to plan our vacation carefully to make sure we have enough time to see everything."
* Related words: organize, arrange, schedule, prepare

**Plan** (adjective)

* Meaning: intended or proposed, but not yet in effect
* Example: "The planned route was changed due to bad weather."
* Related words: proposed, intended, scheduled, projected
html:
giải nghĩa từ "plan" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Plan (noun)

  • Meaning: a detailed proposal for doing or achieving something
  • Example: "The company has a plan to increase sales by 20% next year."
  • Related words: strategy, scheme, blueprint, outline

Plan (verb)

  • Meaning: to decide on a course of action, to make a detailed proposal
  • Example: "We need to plan our vacation carefully to make sure we have enough time to see everything."
  • Related words: organize, arrange, schedule, prepare

Plan (adjective)

  • Meaning: intended or proposed, but not yet in effect
  • Example: "The planned route was changed due to bad weather."
  • Related words: proposed, intended, scheduled, projected
